Set.Text: Lo sentimos, esto ha causado una division entre nosotros.
Muy bien.
Pagaras por esto en su debido momento.
Algo mas?
Que te gustaria discutir?
Me gusta dar largos paseos, especialmente cuando me asalta una persona que me hace enfadar como tu. Dame una oferta seria antes de que acabe con esta reunion...
Ya te dije que te preocupases por ofrecer un trato justo.
Me esta haciendo ofertas que sabe no voy a aceptar?
La historia no se repite en si misma, pero rima.
Acabo de perderme en mis pensamientos. Eso ha sido un territorio poco familiar.
Largate o nos mofaremos de ti una segunda vez.
Si hay alguna cosa que no soporto, es la gente servil.
Aqui estan mis principios y si no te gustan... bien, tengo otros.
Desear ser amigos es un trabajo rapido, pero la amistad es una fruta de maduracion lenta.
Donde hay un monton de vino, la tristeza y la preocupacion toman alas.
No puede haber una crisis la semana que viene. Mi agenda ya esta completa.
Todo el mundo necesita cree en algo. Yo creo que tendre mas vino.
Que te gustaria discutir?
Que te trae hasta mi, en este agraciado dia?
Si la ignorancia es la felicidad, tus debes estar en extasis.
Yo puedo ser tu mejor amigo o tu peor enemigo. Y parece que prefieres lo ultimo.
Sorprendeme, di algo inteligente.
La proxima vez que te vea, recuerdame que no deberia hablar contigo.
Nunca olvido una cara, pero en tu caso hare una excepcion.
Yo no le tengo miedo a la muerte, simplemente no quiero estar ahi cuando ocurra.
Estoy preparado para conocer a mi hacedor. Ahora, que el creador este preparado para la terrible experiencia de encontrarse conmigo, es otra cosa.
El ojo por ojo hace que todo el mundo sea ciego. No crees que es momento de acabar con esta guerra?
Yo no deberia morir por mis creencias, ya que podria estar equivocado. Discutamos un alto el fuego.
Yo no quiero la paz que sobrepasa todo entendimiento, solo quiero el entendimiento que la paz trae.
Es solo una herida superficial.
Todavia no has muerto?
Que pretendes hacer, sangrar sobre mi?

Row.Text: Los reportes de mi muerte fueron extremadamente exagerados.

Set.Text: Saludos. Como progresa el acuerdo de investigacion?
Que negocio puede traer hasta aqui un individuo tan deshonroso como tu?
Siempre es un placer trabajar contigo, amigo. Que te trae a mi Corte?
El villano {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} sigue siendo un dolor de cabeza. No estas de acuerdo?
Saludos. Mi esperanza es que no pase mucho tiempo antes de que finalmente pueda acabar con {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} de una vez por todas.
Se te ha ocurrido algun astuto plan para acabar con {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}?
No pasara mucho tiempo hasta que podamos hacerle frente a {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}. Puedo sentirlo.
Espero que estes mirando bien alto, imaginando la caida de {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} tanto como yo lo hago.
Pronto habremos acabado con {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} de una vez por todas.
Cual es el curso actual de tu pequeña guerra? No atendere tu funeral, pero enviare una adorable carta diciendo que apruebo eso.
Te deseo suerte en tu actual conflicto. Que puedo hacer por ti?
He visto a tus fuerzas militares cerca de mis fronteras. Estas aqui para amenazarme o malgastas mi tiempo sutilmente?
El posicionamiento de tu ejercito es algo preocupante. Le aconsejo que se retire por el bien de la paz en el futuro. Ahora, acerca de que te gustaria hablar?
La expansion de tus ciudades y de tus ciudadanos son como una plaga que infecta la tierra. Miro hacia adelante, esperando el dia en que no tenga que estar viendolo durante mucho mas tiempo.
Mientras tengo esta oportunidad, debo mencionar que su expansion ha preocupado a varios de mis funcionarios. Espero que esto no cause ningun problema en el futuro Que le gustaria discutir?
El robo de la totalidad del territorio de su imperio muestra su codicia. Con el tiempo, algun dia le tocara a usted.

Su reciente tendencia de comprar tierras cerca de nuestras fronteras es realmente preocupante. Por el bien de nuestra futura relacion le aconsejo que tenga cuidado en este asunto. Ahora que he hablado de vuestro impropio acto, Puedes decirme que te trae por aqui?
He oido muchas historias de su poderoso ejercito. Los villanos de este mundo serian sabios al temer tu poder.
Tu imperio es famoso por su fuerte economia. Tal vez algun dia podrian estar dispuestos a compartir algunos de sus secretos con un amigo?
El debil hace una aparicion. Estabamos hablando de ti. Solo cosas malas, te lo aseguro.
Entre tu y yo, su ejercito es una especie de hazmerreir en todo el mundo. No dejes que eso te desanime, sin embargo, estoy seguro de que alguien te pondra fuera de la miseria pronto.
Ah, el sanguinario muestra su rostro! Y que negocio tiene el conmigo?
Tu? Que quieres? No tengo negocios con la gente como tu.
Y que piensas que estas haciendo aqui?
Oh, vale. Resulta que ahora quieres hablar, eh?
Mostrar tu cara aqui despues de las cosas que has dicho? Expon tu propuesta rapidamente antes de que te tire de cabeza de aqui.
Que quieres? Yo no tengo mucho tiempo para aquellos que andan con calañas como {1_PlayerName}.
Ah, hola. Siempre es un placer hablar con un amigo de {1_PlayerName}.
Oh, eres tu. Sere honesto contigo, no mirare con buenos ojos a aquellos que insultan a {1_PlayerName}.
Ah, saludos. Siempre es un placer hablar con otros lider que comparten mi aversion hacia {1_PlayerName}.
I'm sorry, but we haven't known one another for long enough for me to feel comfortable doing so. Perhaps we can revisit this subject in the future.
Give me more time to learn what kind of person you are. I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
Friend, I have a serious matter to discuss. My relationship with {1_CivName} has broken down, and I need you to denounce them as a show of support. What do you say?
I have found myself in a very serious situation, my friend. The time for war has come with {1_CivName}, and I need you to join me on the battlefield. What do you say? (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY)
Pathetic. So you now show your true colors. The world will know of your dishonor.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

So that is the kind of ally you are then? The rest of the world's leaders will hear of your betrayal.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I've had enough of you. I've told the other leaders of the world that working with you is a mistake.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Alright, enough is enough. Informing everyone else of your ill deeds is long overdue.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
So is that how it is then? Very well. I shall not forget this.
You have sullied your reputation with such a foolish move.
You have made a foolish mistake. This incident will not be forgotten.
I had a feeling I was wasting my time with you. Little did I know it would come to this, however.
Ahhh, I've noticed that you've become Allies with {1_CivName}. Glad to hear of it. I'm already on good terms with them myself.

Row.Text: Cualquier aliado de {1_CivName} es mi amigo.
Estas aliado con {1_CivName}, tambien? has hecho una sabia decision.
He visto que te has aliado con mi amigo cercano, {1_CivName}. Preveo que grandes cosas ocurriran.

Set.Text: I recommend that you not get too close in your alliance with {1_CivName}. If so... we might have problems getting along.

Row.Text: Disfruta de la cena del estado celebrando tu alianza con {1_CivName} - solo cuenta los cubiertos depues de que salgan
El amigo de mi enemigo tiene riesgo de llegar a convertirse en mi enemigo. Manten eso en tu mente durante tu alianza con {1_CivName}.

Set.Text: I'll have you know that {1_CivName} and I have worked together in the past, and I have the utmost respect for them. Just so you're aware.

Row.Text: Como puedes mentir tan descaradamente sobre {1_CivName} - No tienes descendencia?
Cuando escupes en la cara de {1_CivName}, estas escupiendo entre los vientos de la guerra.

Set.Text: Glad to hear there are others in the world which share my disgust with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.

Row.Text: Se acerca el día de {1_CivName} siendo arrastrado al basurero de la historia.
Hoy hemos bofeteado la cara de {1_CivName}; en la proxima estacion baileremos en su tumba.

Set.Text: Being on such good terms, I couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. I have done the same. Perhaps this makeshift alliance will lead to great things in the future?
I share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilized empires of the world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now I have to deal with both you and {1_CivName}? I'll have to teach them a lesson.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
I see your armies amassed near my empire. If you wish to attack then come. Don't hide in the shadows like a child.
It's come to my attention that you have a large number of Units near my borders. I request that you move them elsewhere to avoid causing undue distress to my citizens.
It seems your word is worth nothing, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. How despicable. The world will know of your crimes.
Your wanton aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences should you continue assault.
Your expansion efforts are an insult. Know that there will be consequences for this.
The proximity of our nations is causing tension between our peoples. Settle no new cities near me so that we may continue to work in harmony.
My willingness to work with you dwindles as the borders of our nations draw nearer. I demand you not settle near my borders, lest you wish me to take action.
As the borders of our nations draw nearer each year, my warmth toward you cools. Settling new cities near my sovereign territory could strain our relations beyond repair.
We have discovered an ancient de jure claim on the lands between here and your capital. Should you expand further into our rightful dominion, it will only increase our glory when we usurp them!
Your guarantee of not expanding near us seems to have been empty words. Know that there will be consequences for this.
The aggressive manner in which you buy up territory near us is an insult. I had hoped you would be a better neighbor.
Your purchase of land in my vicinity has caused some alarm. I caution you so that this issue does not become more serious.
So it seems you lied when you told us that your empire would stop purchasing land near us. I do not take this insult lightly.
I am very disappointed that you did not stop funding land acquisition near my territory. I had hoped you were a more honorable leader.
I thought you might like to know that I've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. Their land and resources will make a fine addition to my own.
Oops, it seems I've attacked one of your little friends. Care to do something about it?

It's come to my attention that I may have attacked a city-state with which you have had past relations. While it was not my goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
I've been informed that my empire has commenced an attack on a city-state friendly to you. I assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
It takes a long time to grow an old friend. I'd like to form an Alliance, informing the other empires of the bond between our peoples. What do you say?
It is important for our friends to believe we are unreservedly frank with them, and important to friendship that we are not. Would you care to ally with us?
Who says nothing is impossible. I've been doing nothing for years. Let's form an alliance?
Teamwork gives us someone else to blame. Shall we announce to the world we are allies?
I wish you no harm, but it would have been much better if you had never lived.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The end may justify the means as long as there is something that justifies the end. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I'd rather betray the world than let the world betray me.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
My disagreements with {1_PlayerName:textkey} have become too much to bear. This is a situation that can only be resolved on the battlefield. Will you join me, friend?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has become a nuisance. One that can only be dealt with through war. I seek allies - can I count you among them?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat to the stability of this world. The time has come to deal with them once and for all. Will you assist me in this effort?
The time for war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} has come.
Your actions are unforgivable. There can never be reconciliation between our two nations.
Given the circumstances, I have no choice but to assume you are my enemy. As such, I will do what I must to protect my interests.
I wanted to make it known to you that I value our friendship, and hope that it might remain strong.
It is clear to all that you are a wise and mighty ruler. I ask that you might also be compassionate towards those like myself who are weak.
Oh great one, my hope is that you will long serve as a paragon of strength and virtue for lesser leaders such as myself.
Your highly aggressive behavior has not gone unnoticed. Should you keep it up, it will ultimately lead to your downfall.
It's clear you're a fairly uncivilized brute. I have to warn you, your actions are starting to attract quite a bit of attention.
Your warmongering is a popular topic these days. Better watch your back.
You're starting to attract quite a bit of attention. That's not a good thing.

It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within my sphere of influence, and I'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
I've noticed your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. While that's nice, it would be best that you leave their protection to us. I'd hate for either of us to step on any toes.
I couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when I realized it I couldn't help but share.
Ah, it's always nice to see my favorite city-state again.
I'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
Ah, it's you. My apologies. Sometimes I get you mixed up with the barbarians I have to swat from time to time.
I thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
With an army so weak it's a surprise your empire hasn't succumb to a barbarian invasion.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
As I said before, I never repeat myself. The answer is still no.
Very well. I agree to avoid settling in the vicinity of your empire for the time being. Perhaps in the future you will be a more accommodating neighbor.
So be it. I will not settle near your lands. Cooperation is clearly not one of your strong suits.
Unacceptable. I am a sovereign and have the right to settle what lands I please. This offense will not be forgotten.
You dare insult me in such a manner? I will not forget this.
How dare you? Do you believe me to be weak-willed?
Not a chance. You need to brush up on your diplomacy, my friend.
That will work. May a strong friendship lead to the flourishing of our empires.
An excellent idea. May our alliance be the envy of the world.
I am happy to accept. May our empires prosper in friendship.
I must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
I fear that such an arrangement is not in my best interests, so I must decline.
It is agreed. Let us do what we can.
That sounds like a wise move. Let us take to the battlefield.
That is an intriguing offer. I accept. However, my empire is not yet prepared, so give me 10 turns. I will come to you again when I am ready.
Very well. I do what I must to maintain peace in my lands.
I will do what it takes to keep the peace.
Fine. But know that you poison your reputation with acts such as these. For what that might be worth to you.
Please. You're in no position to make such demands.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're not fooling anyone. I have nothing to fear from you.
Haha! You are not strong enough to make such demands of me.
You dare insult me in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it from my dead body.
If you want that you'll have to come and get it.
Don't be a fool.
You ask for too much. I will not drive my nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. I have my dignity, and refuse to hand over such a great bounty so freely.
Your desire to strip my lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten me again so soon? I refuse your demands, you vile beast.
Asking again so soon? You know that greed is a vice, great leader...
Asking for the fruits of others' labor yet again? Your greed is legendary. I will not give in to you.
Let's hear your offer.
What do you propose?
The time has come to end this war. What do you think of this arrangement?
There is no point in this conflict continuing any further. Let us return to peace.
We must not let war define who we are. The time has come to make peace.
I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best. If you don't give it, you shall meet my forces on the battlefield.
A true friend never gets in the way, unless you happen to be going down. I ask for your assistance.
Honesty is the best policy, when there is money in it. I ask for your aid.
Can you help a friend in need? Do the right thing. It will gratify some people and astonish the rest.
Please accept this gift, great leader. May our friendship last forever.
Friends must support one another to overcome the challenges this world poses. Please accept this gift, great leader.
You have a Luxury Resource that I would like. What do you think of this offer?
I believe it's in our mutual interest to allow free passage between our two great empires.
Opening our borders to one another can only serve to solidify our friendship.
I would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

I would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
I feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
Your offer is generous, and I accept.
I graciously accept.
I will never match such generosity. You have bought yourself our good will.
That deal will work.
Let's set a date for the signing ceremony.
Does this face look bovvered?
Pleasure doing business with you.
It's nice when neighbors can get along so well.
It is agreed. I believe this deal will help restore our friendship.
Your generosity is appreciated.
How can you offer those terms with a straight face?
You'll have to do better than that.
If you're trying to be amusing, you're failing miserably.
If I agreed with you we'd both be wrong.
I've had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this isn't it.
I can please only one person per day. Today is not your day. Tomorrow isn't looking good, either.
This deal will work as it stands on the table.
The deal looks good to me as it is.
Looks good to me.
I either get what I want, or I change my mind.
Money is the root of all of my wealth.
Here are my principles, and if you don't like them... well, I have others.
I'm sorry, I don't see a way to make this deal work.
There is no way to make this work.
You've been wrong about every single thing you've ever done, including this.
You are pathetic. I would say that I was surprised by this but that would be a lie.
Death is hereditary. Yours will come soon.
You are clearly unfit to be the ruler of even the most pathetic kingdom.
Don't think of death as an ending. Rather, think of it as an effective way of reducing your expenses.
I may fail to overcome your evil, but it won't be for lack of effort.
Given the circumstances, destroying you would make victory all the sweeter.
Destroy me if you can. I can promise you though, I will not fall before you easily.
So be it. My armies will fight to the death against your wicked forces.
You will forever be known as a villain who preys on the weak.
Do you really think that you can defeat me? Fool. Very well. Let us play this game then.
Your armies are welcome to come and enjoy the destruction that will befall them.
Attacking me was a mistake. I will soon show you why.
Declaring war was a serious error in judgment on your part. That having been said, I will not hesitate to make you regret it.
I will not hesitate to punish you for making such a foolish move.
Good. Let us do this. It gives me an excellent opportunity to finally destroy you.
You wretched fool. I will now mercilessly crush you.
If you wish to fight, I certainly will not back down.
Trading blows with you will be my pleasure. Make sure that you put up a fight.
This should be fun. I revel in every opportunity to defeat someone like you.
Very well. A maelstrom of death shall envelope us both.
While now may not be the ideal moment for us to cross swords, the opportunity to take you down a notch or two is worth it.
Haha. Well, I won't question your decision, but it appears to me that you've made a big mistake.
Your actions fill me with sadness... There is surely a special place in Hell for those such as you.
You would attack us in such a manner? Your hubris knows no limits. I hope that you will one day be judged for this.
Taking advantage of another's weakness is unnecessary in the pursuit of victory. Surely you know there's a better way?
How could you do such a thing? Begone, you vile being.
Taking advantage of someone's trust is despicable. Everyone will know of your betrayal.
You are on the way to destruction.
You have no chance to survive.
You'll be stone dead in a moment.

Row.Text: No pienses en la muerte como un final. En vez de eso, piensa que es una forma efectiva de reducir sus gastos.

Set.Text: You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
All your cities belong to us.
You are too close for comfort. My empire requires more living space.
We are no longer going to ask for the land, but we are going to take it without negotiating.
This world is destined to be mine. It is time for me to show you what that means.
Fate has christened me the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
History shall surely smile on me once I've destroyed the likes of you and the rest of the vermin which surround me.
I'll be honest with you - I intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
You are merely a stepping-stone on my grand ascent to world domination.
Now is the time for my master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
The advantage is mine. I will now destroy you.
I have waited long enough. I have seen an opening in your defense and I will use it to my advantage.
I have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now my time. I will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
Fate is not on your side. Crossing my path with such weakness is a mistake you will not long regret.
The current situation cannot be ignored. It is now or never.
I cannot ignore this chance to eliminate a potential competitor.
Your weakness presents to me a great opportunity. You have my apologies.
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. I will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. I will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of my being, I know I must destroy you.
Your might is unmatched, but I will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with me, but I find a way to destroy you.
Your incredible strength will not deter me from finding a way to defeat you. May the fates smile on me.
Although I do not wish it, I fear that now may be my only opportunity to defeat you. Let us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits me, but should I back down only eventual defeat awaits anyways.
True friends stab you in the front.
I'm afraid you're about to become the immediate past president of the Being Alive Club.
Backstab is such an ugly word. Shall we instead say I am just 'reinterpreting' our supposed friendship?
I have to admit, I never really liked you much. I'm a traitor, but I don't consider myself a traitor. It's time for you to die.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I see no alternative to revealing my deceptive practices. I can now only pray that my armies succeed.
I believe in another life the two of us could have been friends. Unfortunately, that is not how it is now. I wish your armies luck.
My friend, I fear that I have no choice but to break our ties and draw my sword. I hope that you might one day forgive me for this.
I can hardly believe that it's come to this, but yes, this is indeed happening. It is with great sorrow that I must inform you that our friendship must come to an end.
So be it. My armies will extract it from your lands then.
This is your fault. I'm going to kill you. And all the cake is gone. You don't even care, do you?
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
I am happy to see an end to this conflict.
It is good to see the end of this terrible war.
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
You're joking, right?
I am pleased to hear this.
That is good to hear.
You have my thanks.
You are truly a great leader.
History will long remember your great deeds.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is disappointing.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences.
You will regret this.
For freeing those captives, you have my thanks.
I am appreciative for the actions you have taken on behalf of my people.
Thank you. May this be remembered as a historic event which brought our two great empires closer together.
How dare you? Know that there will be consequences for this.
If you are trying to provoke a war, you're doing a fine job.
Well, at least you're honest. But that may be your only good trait.
A likely story.
That is what I was afraid of.
I only hope that is indeed the case.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
It seems that you cannot be reasoned with. What a shame.
I have no more business with the likes of you then.
You disappoint us.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
Very well. I'll be monitoring the situation.
And what would you suggest?
And what would you suggest?
Excellent. I hope that we can continue to find common ground.
And what would you suggest?
Excellent. I hope that we can continue to find common ground.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
